desc_colour_trans: Colour translation (prior to colour rotation). Allen transformation is dependent on input having 0-255 values
desc_colour_rot: Colour rotation (so that the blue axis is the axis of luminance). This is a 3x3 array, but stored as a 1x9 linear array
note_on_slices: Probably need to get x from slice number (e.g. 111 or 119) * 0.025um (or whatever the thickness is)
